lead_paragraph: POWERS--Peter J. The Partnership for New York City mourns the passing of Peter J. Powers, a wise counsel and member of our Board of Directors and Audit Committee. Peter helped guide the city's resurgence in his roles as First Deputy Mayor and as a strategic advisor to business. His legacy is large. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POWERS, PETER J
